p: Ten crossbred barrows Topigs ((♀ Large White × Hybrid (Large White × Pietrain) × ♂ Talent, (mainly Duroc)), 81 ± 3 days old, 31.5 (SD 1.90) kg initial weight, were randomly assigned for three weeks (first week for accommodation) to two groups (SM and LEW), each with five replicates. The animals’ weight was recorded at the start and the end of experiment. Barrows were housed in individual metabolic cages (1.2 × 1.5 × 1 m). The temperature during the experiment was 22 ± 1 °C. Feed was given ad libitum twice a day (08.00 h and 15.00 h) and water was supplied after the first meal.
